snippet: The chip maker says the earnings last quarter slightly missed expectations, and it offered a tepid forecast for the first quarter of 2014.
abstract: Intel reports lower-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings of $2.6 billion, or 51 cents a share, compared with $2.5 billion, or 48 cents a share, in year-ago period; cites shrinking PC industry alongside support from increased demand for servers.
lead_paragraph: The chip maker says the earnings last quarter slightly missed expectations, and it offered a tepid forecast for the first quarter of 2014.

headline.main: Intel Says Fourth-Quarter Earnings Were Off Mark
headline.print_headline: Intel Says Fourth-Quarter Earnings Were Off Mark
